segments.text: Room service , is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am afraid there are not enough outlets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have 6 for each room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but 4 of them are broken . Can you send someone here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK sir , please wait a minute .
segments.speaker: S1
